content.1: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified
content.2: Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.
content.4: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace
content.6: And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him
content.7: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they
content.8: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending,
content.9: I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.
content.10: I was in the Spirit on the Lord’s day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,
content.12: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;
content.13: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks
content.15: And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.
content.16: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance
content.17: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me,
content.19: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;
content.20: The mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.
